description: Describes the specified rule. DescribeRule does not list the targets of a rule. To see the targets associated with a rule, use ListTargetsByRule.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the rule.

nested_items.name: EventPattern
nested_items.description: The event pattern. For more information, see Events and Event Patterns in the Amazon EventBridge User Guide .

nested_items.name: ScheduleExpression
nested_items.description: The scheduling expression. For example, 'cron(0 20 * * ? *)', 'rate(5 minutes)'.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the rule is enabled or disabled.

nested_items.name: RoleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role associated with the rule.

nested_items.name: ManagedBy
nested_items.description: If this is a managed rule, created by an Amazon Web Services service on your behalf, this field displays the principal name of the Amazon Web Services service that created the rule.

nested_items.name: EventBusName
nested_items.description: The name of the event bus associated with the rule.

nested_items.name: CreatedBy
nested_items.description: The account ID of the user that created the rule. If you use PutRule to put a rule on an event bus in another account, the other account is the owner of the rule, and the rule ARN includes the account ID for that account. However, the value for CreatedBy is the account ID as the account that created the rule in the other account.
